Smaller than a conventional submachine gun, the MP7 is a compact and lightweight personal defense weapon that can be carried like a handgun yet is capable of rifle-like effectiveness. Designed to meet NATO requirements for a PDW class firearm with the ability to more efficiently penetrate body armor.
